description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may delete or alter generated artifacts on a host system, including logs or captured files such as quarantined emails. In Exchange environments, monitor for PowerShell cmdlets that may create or alter transport rules, such as `New-TransportRule` and `Set-TransportRule`.(Citation: Microsoft Manage Mail Flow Rules 2023)

external_references.description: Microsoft. (2023, February 22). Manage mail flow rules in Exchange Online. Retrieved March 13, 2023.
